issue.title: [Rust] Create rowcount utility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7971](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7971). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a developer, I would like the ability to count the number of rows that are present in a Parquet file from the command line.  Ideally, this would be something similar to `parquet-rowcount` or `parquet-rows` to count the number of rows in a Parquet file(s).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7971?focusedCommentId=17048983) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6511
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6511>
